title: Ticket #4415: Relative proxy path doesn't work in submit file
description:
A relative path in x509userproxy attribute is handled inconsistently by condor_submit. When condor_submit checks the proxy's validity, it resolves the path relative to the current working directory. But when it sets x509userproxy in the job ad, it constructs a full path using the initialdir attribute.

Condor_submit should consistently treat the proxy path in x509userproxy as relative to the initialdir.
